desc: Kettle Korn Christchurch is the home of handmade popcorn so fresh and so good you may not want to share. Each small-batch is stirred with attitude creating a selection of allergen-free, vegan friendly offerings including refined sugar free options. Available online so you can enjoy Christchurch Kettle Korn anytime!

layout.text: Introducing our new Popit Bouquets. Made beautifully delicious, our bespoke Kettle Korn arrangements are the perfect gift!
